targets.expr: azslurm_cluster_info{cluster="$cluster"}
sum by (partition)(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"})
scontrol_nodes{cluster="$cluster"}
azslurm_partition_info{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_running{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Running Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_configuring{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Configuring Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_pending{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Pending Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Failed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Node Failed Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_suspended{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Suspended Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Timed Out Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Preempted Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "Jobs in Queue", "", "")


)

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_running{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Running Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_configuring{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Configuring Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_pending{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Pending Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Failed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Cancelled Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Node Failed Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_suspended{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Suspended Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Timed Out Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Preempted Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(squeue_partition_jobs{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Jobs in Queue", "", "")
)

panels.description: #of of allocated nodes over all powered up nodes

targets.expr:
sum(sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) + sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) + sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"})) / 
sum(sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) - sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes_powered_down{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"})) * 100

panels.title: Active Cluster Utilization %

panels.description: #of of allocated nodes over all available nodes

targets.expr:
sum(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"} + scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) / 
sum(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) * 100

sum by (cluster) (scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}) + 
sum by (cluster) (scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}) 
/ 
sum(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) * 100

sum(sum by (cluster) (scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}) + sum by (cluster) (scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}) + sum by (cluster)(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"})) / sum(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster", partition=~"$partition"}) * 100

panels.title: Overall Cluster Utilization %

targets.expr: topk(10,squeue_job_nodes_allocated{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"})

panels.title: Current Running Jobs by Node Allocation

targets.expr: sum by (partition)(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"})

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_idle{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "IDLE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "ALLOCATED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DRAINING", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_drained{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DRAINED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_maint{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "MAINTENANCE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_fail{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "FAIL", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_resv{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "RESERVED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powered_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERED DOWN", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_power_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERING DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_noresp{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "UNRESPONSIVE", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powering_up{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERING UP", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "MIXED", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "TOTAL", "", "")
  
)

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_idle{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "IDLE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "ALLOCATED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "DRAINING", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_drained{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "DRAINED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_maint{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "MAINTENANCE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_fail{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "FAIL", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_resv{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "RESERVED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powered_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "POWERED DOWN", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_power_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "POWERING DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_noresp{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "UNRESPONSIVE", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powering_up{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "POWERING UP", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "MIXED", "", "") or 
    label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "TOTAL", "", "")
  
)

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_idle{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "IDLE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "ALLOCATED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "DRAINING", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_drained{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "DRAINED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_maint{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "MAINTENANCE", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_fail{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "FAIL", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_resv{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "RESERVED", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powered_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "POWERED DOWN", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_power_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "POWERING DOWN", "", "") or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_noresp{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "UNRESPONSIVE", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powering_up{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "POWERING UP", "", "") or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "MIXED", "", "") or 
    label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "TOTAL", "", "")
  
)
sum by (partition)(scontrol_partition_nodes{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"})

label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_idle{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"}, "state", "IDLE", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_alloc{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "ALLOCATED", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DOWN", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_draining{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DRAINING", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_drained{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "DRAINED", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_maint{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "MAINTENANCE", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_fail{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "FAIL", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_resv{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "RESERVED", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powered_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERED DOWN", "", "") != 0 or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_power_down{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERING DOWN", "", "") != 0 or
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_noresp{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "UNRESPONSIVE", "", "") != 0 or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_powering_up{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "POWERING UP", "", "") != 0 or 
  label_replace(scontrol_partition_nodes_mixed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} , "state", "MIXED", "", "") != 0

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Completed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Failed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Cancelled Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Node Failed Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Out of Memory Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Timed Out Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Preempted Jobs", "", "") 
)
sum by (state) (label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_submitted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Submitted Jobs", "", ""))

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0), 
    "state", "Completed Jobs", "", ""
  ) or 
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_six_months_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)),
    "state", "Failed Jobs", "", ""
  )
)

panels.title: Cummulative Job Efficiency from last 6  months ($six_month_date)

targets.expr:
sum by (state) (
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Completed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Failed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Cancelled Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Node Failed Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Out of Memory Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Timed Out Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Preempted Jobs", "", "") 
)
sum by (state) (label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_submitted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Submitted Jobs", "", ""))

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0), 
    "state", "Completed Jobs", "", ""
  ) or 
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_month_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)),
    "state", "Failed Jobs", "", ""
  )
)

panels.title: Cummulative Job Efficiency from last month ($one_month_date)

targets.expr:
sum by (state) (
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Completed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Failed Jobs", "", "") or 
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Cancelled Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Node Failed Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Out of Memory Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Timed Out Jobs", "", "") or
  label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Preempted Jobs", "", "") 
)
sum by (state) (label_replace(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_submitted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0, "state", "Submitted Jobs", "", ""))

sum by (state) (
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_completed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0), 
    "state", "Completed Jobs", "", ""
  ) or 
  label_replace(
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} != 0) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_node_failed{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_out_of_memory{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_timeout{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_cancelled{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)) +
    sum(sacct_partition_jobs_total_one_week_preempted{cluster="$cluster",partition=~"$partition"} or vector(0)),
    "state", "Failed Jobs", "", ""
  )
)

panels.title: Cummulative Job Efficiency from last week ($one_week_date)
